attributes.additional_details:
The Prime Minister should withdraw his earlier slapstick accusation that UKIP is comprised "fruitcakes, loonies and closet racists" because it insults the millions of people who support withdrawal from the EU, control of immigration and a return to accountable government in Britain.

Following the shocking behaviour of Rotherham Social Services towards a caring foster couple who are members of UKIP it is urgently necessary for the entire political class to acknowledge the genuine, valid and widely supported policies of UKIP and the PM should take a lead so that vulnerable children are not needlessly denied a loving family life.
